DOC.brief_title: Delayed Umbilical Cord Clamping - C-section Pilot
DOC.detailed_description: Despite expert recommendation delay clamp cord least 2 minute , early cord clamping remain common obstetrical practice . The World Health Organization note data cesarean delivery limit , particularly respect long-term effect infant . Recently , American College Obstetrics Gynecology also note committee statement `` ideal time clamp umbilical cord cesarean section vs. vaginal birth particularly important area future research '' . The objective study conduct pilot trial delay cord clamp cesarean delivery determine progressively longer interval cord clamp feasible related poor maternal neonatal outcome compare outcomes historical control . We offer study entry woman plan elective cesarean delivery collect prospective data progressively longer interval , analyze outcome time interval ensure clinically acceptable , prior extend interval another 30 s. We anticipate approximately 20 woman interval ( 90 120 sec ) perform hemoglobin analysis infant specifically study . If intraoperative blood loss clinically deem excessive , mother baby unstable , cord clamp .
